獨來獨往.definition: (idiom) to be a loner; to keep to oneself

獨具匠心.definition: original and ingenious (idiom); to show great creativity

獨具隻眼.definition: to see what others fail to see (idiom); to have exceptional insight

獨出一時.definition: incomparable; head and shoulders above the competition

獨出心裁.definition: to display originality (idiom); to do things differently

獨創.definition: to come up with (an innovation); innovation

獨力.definition: all by oneself; without exterior help

獨占.definition: to have all to oneself; to monopolize

獨占鰲頭.definition: (idiom) to come first in triennial palace examinations (refers to the carved stone turtle head in front of the imperial palace, next to which the most successful candidate in the imperial examinations was entitled to stand); to be the champion; to be the very best in any field

獨吞.definition: to hog; to keep everything for oneself

獨在異鄉為異客.pinyin: dú zài yì xiāng wèi yì kè
獨在異鄉為異客.definition: a stranger in a strange land (from a poem by Wang Wei 王維|王维[Wang2 Wei2])

獨大.definition: to dominate over all others; to wield all the power; to reign supreme

獨夫民賊.definition: tyrant and oppressor of the people (idiom); traitorous dictator

獨女.definition: a daughter who is an only child

獨子.definition: a son who is an only child

獨孤求敗.definition: Dugu Qiubai, a fictional character appearing in 金庸[Jin1 Yong1] novels

獨守空房.definition: (of a married woman) to stay home alone

獨尊.definition: to revere as sole orthodoxy; to hold supremacy (of a religion, ideology, cultural norm, social group etc); to be dominant

獨尊儒術.definition: dismiss the hundred schools, revere only the Confucians (slogan of the Former Han dynasty)

獨居.definition: to live alone; to live a solitary existence

獨屬.definition: belonging exclusively to; exclusively for; reserved to; special

獨山.definition: Dushan county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

獨山子.definition: Dushanzi District of Karamay City 克拉瑪依市|克拉玛依市[Ke4 la1 ma3 yi1 Shi4], Xinjiang

獨山子區.definition: Dushanzi District of Karamay City 克拉瑪依市|克拉玛依市[Ke4 la1 ma3 yi1 Shi4], Xinjiang

獨山縣.definition: Dushan county in Qiannan Buyei and Miao autonomous prefecture 黔南州[Qian2 nan2 zhou1], Guizhou

獨島.definition: Dokdo (Japanese Takeshima 竹島|竹岛[Zhu2 dao3]), disputed islands in Sea of Japan

獨放異彩.definition: to project singular splendor or radiance; to perform brilliantly

獨斷.definition: to decide alone without consultation; arbitrary; dictatorial

獨斷專行.definition: to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action; a law unto oneself

獨斷獨行.definition: to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action; a law unto oneself

獨有.definition: to own exclusively; unique to; specific; there is only

獨木不成林.definition: a lone tree does not make a forest (idiom); one cannot accomplish much on one's own

獨樹一幟.definition: lit. to fly one's banner on a solitary tree (idiom); fig. to act as a loner; to stand out; to develop one's own school; to have attitude of one's own

獨樹一格.definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)

獨步.definition: lit. walking alone; prominent; unrivalled; outstanding

獨生.definition: only (child); without siblings; to be the sole survivor

獨生女.definition: a daughter who is an only child

獨生子.definition: a son who is an only child

獨生子女政策.pinyin: dú shēng zǐ nǚ zhèng cè

獨當一面.definition: to assume personal responsibility (idiom); to take charge of a section

獨秀.definition: to surpass; to stand above the crowd

獨立中文筆會.pinyin: dú lì zhōng wén bǐ huì

獨立國家聯合體.pinyin: dú lì guó jiā lián hé tǐ
獨立國家聯合體.definition: Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union)

獨立自主.definition: independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination; to act independently; to maintain control over one's own affairs

獨立門戶.definition: to live apart from parents (of married couple); to achieve independence

獨立顯卡.definition: (computing) discrete GPU; dedicated GPU (abbr. to 獨顯|独显[du2xian3])

獨聯體.definition: Commonwealth of Independent States (former Soviet Union); abbr. for 獨立國家聯合體|独立国家联合体

獨腳戲.definition: variant of 獨角戲|独角戏[du2 jiao3 xi4]

獨腳跳.definition: to jump on one foot; to hop

獨處.definition: to live alone; to spend time alone (or with a significant other)

獨行其是.definition: to go one's own way (idiom); to act independently without asking others

獨資.definition: wholly-owned (often by foreign company); exclusive investment

獨辟蹊徑.definition: to blaze a new trail (idiom); to display originality

獨院兒.definition: erhua variant of 獨院|独院[du2 yuan4]

獨霸.definition: to dominate (a market etc); to monopolize

獨霸一方.definition: to exercise sole hegemony (idiom); to dominate a whole area (market, resources etc); to hold as one's personal fiefdom

獨顯.definition: (computing) discrete GPU; dedicated GPU (abbr. for 獨立顯卡|独立显卡[du2li4 xian3ka3])

獨龍.definition: Drung or Dulong ethnic group of northwest Yunnan

獨龍江.definition: Dulong river in northwest Yunnan on border with Myanmar, tributary of Salween or Nujiang 怒江, sometimes referred to as number four of Three parallel rivers 三江並流|三江并流, wildlife protection unit
